name: Bombs Away! (MylerRL)
description:
A small 60-second game made for the #oneminutejam. The goal is to navigate the maze and find the water before you explode.

Can be played on a touchscreen or with mouse

The player can be clicked and dragged or dragged via touchscreen.
R- Restart Level
Esc- Return to the Main menu

Available to play in the browser or downloadable on Mac and Windows
